Uses of Class
gs.spri.raven.Token

  • Packages that use Token 
    Package Description
    gs.spri.raven
    Low level classes representing the authentication process, the request to raven and the token it returns.
    gs.spri.raven.servlet
    High level classes to make use of the raven authentication service.

    • Uses of Token in gs.spri.raven

      Methods in gs.spri.raven with parameters of type Token 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Authenticator.isTokenValid(Request r, Token t)
      Validate a token against a request object, catching the exception thrown by the validateTokenAgainstRequest method.
      void Authenticator.validateTokenAgainstRequest(Request r, Token t)
      Validates a Token and Request object, using the configured KeyStore to do cryptographic verification of the Token and checking against the Request object to ensure that the Token is one that matches the Request.

    • Uses of Token in gs.spri.raven.servlet

      Methods in gs.spri.raven.servlet that return Token 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Token RavenAuthenticator.getToken()
      Returns the authentication token most recently received from the Raven server.
      Token RavenServlet.getToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession ses)
      Returns the authentication token associated with 'ses' or 'null'.
